text: Estanislau de Figueiredo Pamplona, best known as Pamplona (born in Belém, Pará State, 24 March 1904 – 29 October 1973) is a former Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. ==Honours== ===Club=== * Campeonato Carioca (3): :Botafogo: 1930, 1933, 1934 Category:1904 births Category:1973 deaths Category:Footballers from Belém Category:1930 FIFA World Cup players
title: Pamplona (footballer)
